content.raw:
Also, gazebo crashes when setting the global max_contacts value to zero.
~~~
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fff9a7fb700 (LWP 18814)]
0x00000000f349d550 in ?? ()
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00000000f349d550 in ?? ()
#1  0x00007ffff2d9d439 in gazebo::physics::ODEPhysics::UpdatePhysics (
    this=0xb9a880)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo/gazebo/physics/ode/ODEPhysics.cc:379
#2  0x00007ffff7368fce in gazebo::physics::World::Update (
    this=0xb3fb30)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo/gazebo/physics/World.cc:569
#3  0x00007ffff7369621 in gazebo::physics::World::Step (this=0xb3fb30)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo/gazebo/physics/World.cc:489
#4  0x00007ffff736a548 in gazebo::physics::World::RunLoop (
    this=0xb3fb30)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo/gazebo/physics/World.cc:353
#5  0x00007ffff5f4bce9 in thread_proxy ()
   from /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.46.1
#6  0x00007ffff6ab5e9a in start_thread (arg=0x7fff9a7fb700)
    at pthread_create.c:308
#7  0x00007ffff52f4cbd in clone ()
    at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:112
#8  0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
(gdb) 
~~~

Also, gazebo crashes when setting the global max_contacts value to zero.
